metadata.title: CVE-2011-1412 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: sys/sys_unix.c in the ioQuake3 engine on Unix and Linux, as used in Worldof Padman 1.5.x before 1.5.1.1 and OpenArena 0.8.x-15 and 0.8.x-16, allowsremote game servers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharactersin a long fs_game variable.

criterions.comment: openarena package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
